de.esoco.lib.collection

Class ListEvent<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.esoco.lib.event.GenericEvent<S>
      • de.esoco.lib.event.ElementEvent<C,E,E>
        • de.esoco.lib.collection.CollectionEvent<E,java.util.List<E>>
          • de.esoco.lib.collection.ListEvent<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.esoco.lib.event.Event<java.util.List<E>>

    public class ListEvent<E>
extends CollectionEvent<E,java.util.List<E>>
    A collection event subclass that provides access to the index of the list position that is affected by the index.

    • Method Detail

      • getIndex

        public final int getIndex()
        Returns the index of the list position that will be affected by this event. An index value of -1 means that the last element in the list is affected (typically used if an element is added to the end of a list).
        Returns:
        The index of the affected list position
